thread.title: Recut version of 'La La Land' directed by David Lynch looks more like a suspense thriller
thread.title_full: Recut version of 'La La Land' directed by David Lynch looks more like a suspense thriller

title: Recut version of 'La La Land' directed by David Lynch looks more like a suspense thriller
text:
Recut version of 'La La Land' directed by David Lynch looks more like a suspense thriller 14 By Mashable 2017-02-22 17:39:08 UTC 
Everyone knows that La La Land is the feel-good, singing and dancing movie of the year. And with Damien Chazelle nominated for "Best Director" in this weekend's Academy Awards, we wondered what the film would look like with an entirely different director and tone. 
This episode of Trailer Mix brings you a darker, more surrealist version courtesy of David Lynch. 
Visit
